		public Root()

			setControllerSignature(sig("", "IndexController"));

			public Beta(org.civilian.Resource parent)

				this.imspecial_txt.setControllerSignature(sig(".beta", "PathController"));

			public static class Some extends org.civilian.Resource

				public Some(org.civilian.Resource parent)
				{
					super(parent, "some");
					setControllerSignature(sig(".beta", "SomeController"));

					this.thing = new org.civilian.Resource(this, "thing");
					this.thing.setControllerSignature(sig(".beta", "SomeController").withMethodSegment("thing"));

			public Mixed(org.civilian.Resource parent)
